input_parameters: address nftAddress, uint256 tokenId, uint64 numDays
requires: Maximum of 10 rental days are allowed
Number of installments must be greater than 1
events: InstNftInsPaid(IERC721(nftAddress).ownerOf(tokenId), msg.sender, nftAddress, tokenId, expires, numDays, 1, Ins, Ins)
return_line: 'Successfully rented the nft by paying the first installment'
